lead_paragraph: MURPHY--Arthur W. Columbia Law School mourns the passing of Arthur W. Murphy, beloved professor for nearly 50 years, distinguished alumnus, and trusted governmental adviser on legal issues surrounding atomic energy and nuclear power. His voice of reason and creativity will be deeply missed. Our sympathies go out to his wife, Jean, his children, Lois, Rachel, and Paul, and the rest of the family. 1/3
